attributes.action: Let Palestinians enter Masjid Al-Aqsa. Stop The War
attributes.additional_details:
Local Palestinians who live close or far to the masjid can't even enter the third holiest Masjid In Islam. Everyday Innocent Palestinians are killed. Yet No one is Stopping this Conflict.  If late Princess Diana had the courage to stop the War why can't we as British Citizens do the same.
 Thanks Atif Hussain
